properties.description: Selects top 100 rows in products table

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT Category, 
    COUNT (*) as ProductCount
    -- TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakez5na780.dfs.core.windows.net/files/product_data/products.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY Category;
